name: RGBYCM - The Quest for the Fuel Cells
name_original: RGBYCM - The Quest for the Fuel Cells
description:
A retro inspired game with a real NSF (Nintendo Sound Format) soundtrack!

On a mission to deactivate the RGBYCM Fortress that has disturbed the peace in the galaxy, you have crash-landed on planet RGBYCM.

Next to your mission to deactivate the Fortress, you have also been tasked to collect the required Fuel Cells for your Spaceship.

This is your only way to escape the planet after you deactivate the Fortress. 

Good luck!

-Make your way through 14 challenging stages!

-Depending if you have enough Fuel Cells and the secret weapon, three endings are possible!

-NSF 8-bit music! (Download the NSF below!)

-Try to get all achievements!

Website: https://sites.google.com/view/rgbycm
